author: UltPanda
install_msg: Thanks for installing BerriBattle! This cog adds a One Piece themed RPG system with berries, devil fruits, and epic battles. Use `[p]help BerriBattle` to get started.
name: BerriBattle
short: One Piece themed RPG with berries and battles
description: A comprehensive RPG system inspired by One Piece featuring berries, devil fruits, dynamic battles with UI components, and achievement systems.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user data including berries, devil fruits, battle statistics, and achievements. Data can be cleared with admin commands.
